Guia_0302
Ana Clara Lonczynski - 0860668

02a.)
a.) C1,6 (321(4)) = X(2)
  3   2  1
[11][10][01]
111001(2) = 1 11001 = 0 00110(2)
111001(2) = 1 11001 = 0 00110 + 1 = 0 00111(2)

b.) C1,8 (B2(16)) = X(2)

    B    2 
[1011][0010]
10110010(2) = 1 0110010 = 0 1001101(2)
10110010(2) = 1 0110010 = 0 1001101 + 1 = 0 1001110(2)

c.) C2,6 (231(4)) = X(2)

   2   3  1
[10][11][01]
101101(2) = 1 01101 = 0 10010(2)
101101(2) = 1 01101 = 0 10010 + 1 = 0 10011(2)

d.) C2,10 (146(8))= X(2)

   1    4    6
[001][100][110]
001100110(2) = 0 001100110 = 1 110011001(2)
001100110(2) = 0 001100110 = 1 110011001 + 1 = 1 110011010(2)

e.) C2,8 (6F(16)) = X(2)

    6     F
[0110][1111]
01101111(2) = 0 1101111 = 1 0010000(2)
01101111(2) = 0 1101111 = 1 0010000 + 1 = 1 0010001(2)
